text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium velutinum is an anamorph species of fungus in the genus Penicillium which was isolated from soil in the United States. Penicillium velutinum produces verruculogen, verrucosidin, verruculotoxin, decalpenic acid, dehydroaltenusin, cyciooctasulfur, atrovenetinone, altenusin and penitrem A
